definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sign, mark, describe with a mark (so Ges (who compares [[תאה]], [[תוה]]) Dl:Pr 116 (not W)) only

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִתְאַוִּיתֶם]] [[לָכֶם]] mark you out, measure, Nu 34:10 (P), so Vrss (cf. [[תְּתָאוּ לָכֶם]] v:Nu 34:7; v:Nu 34:8; v. however Di, & sub I. [[אוה]]).
